variations.description: Within 5 seconds, attacks all enemies and heals all allies 7 times respectively, each dealing Magic DMG equal to 30% of Norn's ATK and healing allies for 35% of Norn's ATK.
Within 5 seconds, attacks all enemies and heals all allies 7 times respectively, each dealing Magic DMG equal to 35% of Norn's ATK and healing allies for 40% of Norn's ATK.
Within 5 seconds, attacks all enemies and heals all allies 7 times respectively, each dealing Magic DMG equal to 40% of Norn's ATK and healing allies for 45% of Norn's ATK.
Within 5 seconds, attacks all enemies and heals all allies 7 times respectively, each dealing Magic DMG equal to 45% of Norn's ATK and healing allies for 50% of Norn's ATK.
Within 5 seconds, attacks all enemies and heals all allies 7 times respectively, each dealing Magic DMG equal to 50% of Norn's ATK and healing allies for 55% of Norn's ATK.
Reduces damage taken by all allies by 18% for 10s. When the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 24% of Norn's ATK.
Reduces damage taken by all allies by 21% for 10s. When the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 28% of Norn's ATK.
Reduces damage taken by all allies by 24% for 10s. When the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 32% of Norn's ATK.
Reduces damage taken by all allies by 27% for 10s. When the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 36% of Norn's ATK.
Reduces damage taken by all allies by 30% for 10s. When the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 40% of Norn's ATK.
Heals all allies for 10% of Norn's ATK every 2s.
Heals all allies for 10% of Norn's ATK every 1 second.
